timeline.message: add assertion for no server roll

timeline.bodyText:
Can the managed server timestamps be verified too?
Also, ideally this code should also verify that the 'weblogic.introspectVersion' label on each pod has also been updated.  Note that right now there's a wide race where the label may not be updated until several seconds after the online update has propagated - it waits until the next make-right. Johnny is working on a fix, but even when fixed there will still be a race - just less of a race (maybe less than a second?).
timeline.author: tbarnes-us

timeline.message: add assertion to MiiDynamicUpdate tests to verify that all server pods are not rolled, and introspectVersion are updated
